感谢杀机制作组，让我完美的拥有了情绪管控能力，顺便还让我发现需要换一个新鼠标了。打了一下午屠排到的人类基本上把把绿紫加上一点红。行吧，看来zzz觉得我这种萌新就该被人皇暴打吧。游戏不错，匹配让人脑溢血，什么人类蹲起手电嘲讽就不提了，一下午直接被打到心态爆炸。新手玩屠一定要心理素质强，别被游戏玩了。不能像我这样，心态炸到整的鼠标差不多快被捏坏了。

this game favors survivors if you play killer you will just get bullied by other survivors this game makes me soo frustrated but i cant stop playing haha. The matchmaking is soo broken soo new players go up against high ranked players do not recommend this game i dont even recommend it to people I hate haha
ghad damn is this game fun and good as a mf, but holy fucking shit balls does it make me mad

Not even worth $0.99, nor was it worth the 5 minutes it took to download, i would rather get sued by epic games for cheating in fortnite and then proceed to lose the case in court than play another second of this almost-excuse of a game, if you could even call it that. I have a GTX 1080 TI, an I7-8700k, 32GB of ram, and i consistently get frame rates so slow, I could produce them faster with a Model 95 Polaroid Instant camera, But the Image quality of that camera actually happens to be better than the image quality in this game. This should've never made it past Steam Greenlight and I encourage this game's developers to completely remove any evidence that it ever existed at all because it's solid proof that they've commited a serious offense to some degree.
很好玩的一款游戏，十分推荐购买（个人看法）
適合新手入坑 只是要辛苦一點╮(╯∀╰)╭

Played Peekaboo with Pinhead for an entire match, and a couple minutes after gates had opened.
11/10

Just to start this off, I would like to make it clear that this is a very good game with a very deep learning progression.

Then why am I marking it as "No" !!!??? Well, its because I am looking at it from [b][u]a very specific mindset[/u][/b]: A game needs to start being enjoyable in the first few hours of playing it. A completely new player needs to be able to learn it in the first few hours and derive a decent level of satisfaction and enjoyment by playing the game.

Not with DbD: Maybe not so much as a survivor, but absolutely CAPITAL NOT when you are playing as a killer. This game requires you to put in many many days/weeks/months of time into practice if you want to get good with killers. There is no way to understand different mechanics, perks, buffs & de-buffs and different maps other than, by playing countless games and get egged on when you have no clue what's going on. Many players feel the need for a practice mode to understand all these things - Hey, let me queue up a game with just me and some mindless bots running in a straight line on the map of my own choice - nothing could be easier than that - But NO. BECAUSE...

In the last few weeks I have seen how good (and quite frankly addicting) the game is and I have spent many many hours on YouTube looking at various channels of guides, etc. But I would rather spend an hour in-game learning and doing what I need to learn rather than watching two to three hours of videos online. Why ? Because even after I have watched two hours of video on how to play a killer, I have crap for muscle memory and even less for experience with other stuff (maps, perks, etc.)

This is where, personally, the game loses its meaning for me. If I have to spend three to four months being beaten around, losing and mostly not deriving any enjoyment from the game just so that I can "learn" it over time - this is not for me. That is something I get generally paid for and people generally call that a job !!! I have respect for the people who have gotten really good at the game over time - but personally, I would rather devote that much time and effort on a life skill than a game. 

Its a good game and if it had the training wheels for new players to get better, it would be great - maybe in future it would. Until then, I would just feel sad for all the money I spent on buying the base game and all its expansions.
Just buy winrar... it doesnt take your soul away from you

The clap of my ass cheeks alerted the killer to my location, i tried to pallet the killer but my cake was so big it blocked it. What use is a glorious bottom if it keeps me from survival.

I tried to pallet stun my mom and but she had spirit fury along with fire up and hit me through the pallet and then I got sent to the map county jail (lame indoor map btw) and then I tried to give her my items so she would give me hatch but she just kept the game hostage in a cage this game suks.

O jogo é bom e divertido, e eu até posso dizer que é bem balanceado. Vários motivos fazem o jogo ser único, porém, deixa a desejar em relação a bugs e a falta de otimização. Mas fora os bugs, o jogo está me tirando várias horas de tempo e consegue me divertir e me entreter como poucos jogos conseguem, recomendo sim, e claro, compre quando uma promoção aparecer.
Great game but its bs sometimes so if u get mad quick be careful
after 700 hrs i feel my review needs an update. the game itself is hilarious, adrenaline pumping, screaming. everything. one of my favorite games so far. that said. i dont understand the mmr

Игра максимально сломана и придумана для того чтобы тебе разминали очечо, хитбоксы уебанские, текстуры не соответствуют своим реальным размерам, читеры, токсики, фармеры, афкшники, дебустеры, идиоты. Комьюнити почти всё прогнившее в ноль. Спасибо BHVR за то что превратили за столько лет хорошую игру в помойку для сракоёбов

The game, after a LONG period of extensive playing, and enjoyment, is actually just a fucking joke. The servers don't work, the devs have no idea how to play at high level and continueously give an advantage to the survivors while increasing the difficulty of the killer. The game has HONESTLY been a fucking waste of time and effort for me to play.
Super fun to play with friends, but it can be super frustrating sometimes. I still love it though :/
